(6) 1. khemavaggo
1, khemasuttaṃ
Paṇṇāsakāsaṅgahitā vaggā khemavaggo paṭhamo
52 Khemaṁ khemanti āvuso vuccati kittāvatā nu kho āvuso khemaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatāti. Idhāvuso bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi .pe. Paṭhamajjhānaṁ upasampajja viharati ettāvatāpi kho āvuso khemaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā pariyāyena .pe. Puna caparaṁ āvuso bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati paññāyapassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti ettāvatāpi kho āvuso khemaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā nippariyāyenāti.
2, khemappattasuttaṃ
53 Khemappatto khemappattoti āvuso vuccati .pe.
3, amatasuttaṃ
54 Amataṁ amatanti āvuso vuccati.
4, amatappattasuttaṃ
55 Amatappatto amatappattoti āvuso vuccati.
5, abhayasuttaṃ
56 Abhayaṁ abhayanti āvuso vuccati.
6, abhayappattasuttaṃ
57 Abhayappatto abhayappattoti āvuso vuccati.
7, passaddhisuttaṃ
58 Passaddhi passaddhīti āvuso vuccati.
8, anupubbapassaddhisuttaṃ
59 Anupubbapassaddhi anupubbapassaddhīti āvuso vuccati.
9, nirodhasuttaṃ
60 Nirodho nirodhoti āvuso vuccati.
10, anupubbanirodhasuttaṃ
61 Anupubbanirodho anupubbanirodhoti āvuso vuccati
Kittāvatā nu kho āvuso anupubbanirodho vutto bhagavatāti. Idhāvuso bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi .pe. Paṭhamajjhānaṁ upasampajja viharati ettāvatāpi kho āvuso anupubbanirodho vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena .pe. Puna caparaṁ āvuso bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati paññāyapassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti ettāvatāpi kho āvuso anupubbanirodho vutto bhagavatā nippariyāyenāti.
11, abhabbasuttaṃ
62 Nava bhikkhave dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ. Katame nava rāgaṁ dosaṁ mohaṁ kodhaṁ upanāhaṁ makkhaṁ palāsaṁ issaṁ macchariyaṁ. Ime kho bhikkhave nava dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ. Nava bhikkhave dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātuṁ. Katame nava rāgaṁ dosaṁ mohaṁ kodhaṁ upanāhaṁ makkhaṁ palāsaṁ issaṁ macchariyaṁ. Ime kho bhikkhave nava dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṁ sacchikātunti. Khemavaggo paṭhamo. Tassuddānaṁ khemo ca amataṁ ceva abhayapassaddhiyena ca nirodho anupubbo ceva dhammaṁ pahāya bhabbena cāti.
